Description.Text: The 4.5-star Nirvana by the Sea Apartments offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Gold Coast. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as private pool, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, desk. Take a break from a long day and make use of fitness center, sauna, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, spa. For reliable service and professional staff, Nirvana by the Sea Apartments caters to your needs.
